abstract: Novartis says it has agreed to buy Genoptix, an American oncology laboratory, for $470 million in cash.
snippet: Novartis says it has agreed to buy Genoptix, an American oncology laboratory, for $470 million in cash.
lead_paragraph: 7:45 a.m. | Updated Novartis, the Swiss pharmaceutical giant, said on Monday that it had agreed to buy Genoptix, an American oncology laboratory, for $470 million in cash.

headline.main: Novartis Buys U.S. Cancer Lab for $470 Million
